content: I'm thinking of redecorating my office and I need some inspiration. I was at a flea market last month and saw some great vintage posters, including a 1960s travel poster for Paris that I really liked. Can you give me some ideas on how to incorporate vintage posters into my office decor? By the way, I finally hung up the painting I bought from that local artist at the flea market today, it looks amazing in my living room!
